alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 18 at 3:49AM AKDT until September 19 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Utqiagvik west. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of low lying areas along the coast. Shoreline erosion will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels will be 1 to 3 feet above the normal high tide line. The highest water levels are expected Sunday afternoon into Monday morning. Erosion of the beach berm near Utqiagvik may occur.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
